edge: Composer Jeet Gannguli created the music for Sadak 2.
Ankit Tiwari, as a singer and composer, contributed to the soundtrack of Sadak 2.
Samidh Mukerjee contributed to the composition of the soundtrack for Sadak 2.
Urvi, as a composer, was involved in creating music for Sadak 2.
Suniljeet contributed to the composition of some songs in Sadak 2's soundtrack.
Ankit Tiwari sang 'Tum Se Hi', a song from the Sadak 2 soundtrack.
Rashmi Virag wrote the lyrics for 'Shukriya', a song from the Sadak 2 soundtrack.
Suniljeet sang 'Ishq Kamaal', a song from the Sadak 2 soundtrack.
Vijay Vijawatt wrote the lyrics for 'Dil Ki Purani Sadak', a song from the Sadak 2 soundtrack.
Rashmi Virag wrote the lyrics for 'Chal Tera Shukriya', a song from the Sadak 2 soundtrack.
Vijay Vijawatt wrote the lyrics for 'Purani Sadak' (Reprise), a song from the Sadak 2 soundtrack.
